name: Irish Forestry and Forest Products Association
goal: The Irish Forestry and Forest Products Association (IFFPA) was established to represent the broad forest and forest-based business sector. We are the only industry association that represents the sector as a whole and provides mechanisms for collaboration on a sector-wide basis.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Brexit
State Aid
Environmental Regulation
Internal Market
External trade
Stndards and harmonisation
